U.S. Election Betting: CFTC, Kalshi Both Grilled by Judges in Appeals Court https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/09/19/us-election-betting-cftc-kalshi-both-grilled-by-judges-in-appeals-court/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines PQQBWHNKMRCRTK4ZCHDDTMNW7M Nikhilesh DeA panel of judges grilled attorneys for the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission and prediction-betting platform Kalshi over the company's efforts to launch political prediction markets in the U.S., without indicating whether they'd allow Kalshi to offer these products while reviewing a lower court's ruling on the products.
